name: CardiacSurgery
title: Cardiac Surgery
description: This value set includes 6 legacy codes (last published in 2012).
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts of procedures for cardiac surgery.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent cardiac surgery.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
